title: Dragon Ball Movie 4 – The Path to Power
alternative_title: Dragon Ball Movie 4: Saikyou e no Michi, ドラゴンボール 最強への道
description: This is the famous 10th Anniversary movie that was released in 1996. Done in GT-style animation, the movie re-told Goku's meeting with his original friends (Bulma, Oolong, Yamcha, Kame-Sen'nin, etc.) and his battle against the Red Ribbon Army. This movie was the last DragonBall theatrical animated feature ever produced.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Demons>, <Genre -> Martial Arts>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
